text: I know everyone has their own experience with medical centers, doctors and hospitals. Mine has been nothing less than amazing. Having everything already on file is convenient and time saving. I love the fact I have the ability to see multiple specialist and not having to provide all of my medical information every time. Plus the fact they use mychart is amazing all of my doctors and medical history is right there. Avita has so many specialist, doctors and services that it is rare to have to go anywhere outside of the Avita health system.

No-one expects good things from a visit to the ER. My experience was GREAT!  I arrived and was greeted  by a friendly young lady who took my name and birthday and grabbed me a wheelchair. I had injured my calf, but was not in acute pain. She took me to a room without delay where my nurse joined us moments later. She checked vital signs, got my story and chief complaint and told me who my providers would be. The PA arrived not 5 minutes later, did a thorough exam and explained the tests he thought were indicated. The very friendly registration clerk came in to verify/update my records and then the Ultrasound Tech and X-ray Tech each arrived to get my testing done in my room. The PA returned to my room, gave me my diagnosis and asked if I needed pain meds to go home. I was given a knee immobilizer and crutches and the nurse went over my discharge instructions and put my knee brace on for me. She then escorted me to my car to make sure that I could get in it with the brace on and that I was confident that I could drive myself home. My entire visit was <90 minutes.  I never actually spoke with a doctor, but felt as though my care was exceptional.

I've delivered babies at four different hospitals, and Avita was the best experience by far! The entire staff-the nurses, doctors, anesthesiologist, were all spectacular! They were respectful, knowledgeable, and dedicated to my comfort. I cannot recommend them enough!

The staff and patient care at Ontario Avita E.R. was amazing. Everyone was so nice and prompt at providing the best quality care. They kept me updated as the test results came back and didn't wait. I would recommend this location to everyone! Best E.R. hands down!

Worse experience here. Student PA was clueless and kept talking about the pain in her knee. She never complained about pain in her knee. Then he came back twice to verify what leg it was. They took an xray and "didn't see anything". No kidding, and MRI would have made more sense. The actual NP said an MRI would show more accurately whats going on, but doesn't think she needs one tonight. WTH? Told us if it gets worse, contact the specialist. Then the discharge girl comes in, but she came in the wrong room. She was looking for Heather. Only bright spot was the nurse who explained very clearly to us some questions we had. Kudos to him. What's the point of hospitals if you're not gonna treat serious injuries?

Went to the Avita Emergency Room for the first time ever. Absolutely best emergency experience I’ve had in 52 years. From the gentleman helping me in to sally at reception to my nurse Hope. They were all so pleasant and professional and most of all HELPFUL! The doctor was great I wish I could remember his name but all of it made MY emergency so much easier! Thank you Avita staff!

Pre registration gentleman was friendly and efficient. I barely sat down in waiting room when I was taken back for my lab work. I think her name was Judy and she was also very friendly and efficient. She even called my doctors office to check if I could have all the labs completed that visit so would nit have to come back. I also got my results the next day.

Can't say anything bad about them because even though I wasn't expecting much, they at least tried to be helpful(I think)The experience wasn't altogether the worst ever but I at least got a referral to a reputable orthopedic surgeon and will be going to see him. Just a word of advice to them would be to at least take the patient's complaints about pain more seriously because energy doesn't lie and was a little put off by some of the personnel there which wasn't surprising. DON'T BE SO OBVIOUS ABOUT YOUR DISDAIN FOR THE PUBLIC AS WE ALREADY GET THAT ENOUGH WITH THE POLICE....... PLEASE AND THANK YOU.

EVERYTHING with this knee replacement went PERFECTLY!  DR FOSTER has everything fine-tuned to the smallest detail.  I want to thank EVERY single person that cared for me.  The BEST staff in the world from the nurses, nurse practioners, anesthesiologist,  and all of care given by the PHYSICAL THERAPISTS!!  Because of all of you I am going to get my other knee done in 6 weeks from the date of my first one and with the grace of God will make it to my grandsons college graduation in December!!  Thanks again DR FOSTER!

From the time you arrive,  to the time you leave,  everyone is so accommodating and pleasant. Even the security guard that greeted us made sure we were comfortable. If you have any doubts about using Avita, I hope my comments will still relieve your concerns.  The experience of going to the hospital exceeded my expectations of what a hospital visit could be.

When I walked into the ER at Avita Ontario the receptionist saw me carrying my daughter and had a wheel chair ready for me to sit her down in. We didn’t wait long at all before my daughter was called back. Once again. Service was quick and every nurse and doctor was kind and did well with my daughter. We were able to get a lot done at Avita for her situation that day. Thank you for taking such good care of my daughter. What a blessing.

The nurses were amazing and very helpful . They were there for me and asked questions . The doctor however l, just seemed like he was ready to go . It felt as if he wanted to be done dealing with me . It felt  as if he did not feel like being bothered also. Within 1 minute of being in my room he was in and out.  No tests were ran to address any underlying  issues as to what was happening with me….I received a quick fix to a an ongoing issue

Took my partner into the ER early one morning, and while the nurses were WONDERFUL and super helpful (especially you, nurse mims!) the doctor seemed like she didn’t care, she barely spoke to him, and when she did it was a very dismissive and uncaring. She told us that he needed to follow up with a neurologist, and sent us home with discharge instructions stating to call neurology and schedule an appointment ASAP. When we called neurology they didn’t have the referral, called the ER back twice to get the referral pushed through, still nothing, when we called neurology back they said they still had not gotten the referral, and brushed off the issue stating that he just needed to see a PCP, even though they did not actually see him.

I had an ER visit yesterday and had an excellent experience. Dr. Foskey and the nurses were awesome!! So caring and compassionate. Dr. Foskey explained things in depth with me and did not talk down to me.  He listened and took me seriously and trusted that I knew my own body. I have chronic health issues and have had really bad experiences with healthcare. I appreciate the care I was given!

I don't believe the doctor listened to the issues I had. It's the next day and I'm a lot worse. I guess I'm going to have to go to Ohio health

Had the same doctors last time. They did better but he referred me to neurological doctor that was part of Ohio health not avita so when I called them they wouldn't take the referral

I went to the ER last night because of gallbladder pain that I’ve dealt with for years and know what it feels like. The Dr had a very lazy uncaring attitude! The nurse named Gabby was exceptional and I just loved her. I don’t think this Dr had a clue in the world and his name is Stephen Escue. He gave off a very bad vibe that just didn’t sit well with me! What he said and what my MyChart said didn’t match. My MyChart basically said that it was my gallbladder but he said it was my liver metastasis which is from having stage 4 breast cancer. Even the nurse wasn’t buying what he stated but like she said she’s not a Dr and can’t diagnose. I read between the lines.

My visit today was outstanding. It is Halloween and the office went all out in a Batman theme. Batman himself injected my shoulders! I can’t say enough about the exemplary level of care provided, in costume 😀 …

Dr. Riehm was patient and kind- and knowledgeable, answering all my questions and showing me my x-rays. The staff were also very nice, making me feel comfortable at my first visit. The injection in my knee was effective, relieving my pain. I'm really glad to have an orthopedic Dr. so close to home!!

It’s sad that on our drive there I talked the hospital up to my boyfriend but when we get there the lady at the front desk wasn’t pleasant and had a dirty look on her face. Then when taken back to his room the nurse was asking questions and before the dr even came into threw the door way he interrupted the nurse very rudely. Listened to his lungs is only 2 places. said everything sounds clear it’s just a cold. Disregarded the fact he had a fever we couldn’t control, he has seizures, he had chest tightness and has a heart condition. The doctor wouldn’t even listen to what we had to say. If something happens yo him that dr won’t be working there anymore

I used to hate Avita. Truly. However,  the past two times I've been there... they have been wonderful! They saw two of my kids at the same time, they were really great with them! I was there this past week and my nurses and doc were wonderful.  Really nice experience. Thank you!

I’m not sure the lady at the front desk was really knowledgeable.  Check in was a little rocky but the girl who did my test was excellent. She was kind , knowledgeable and patient. She pushed me in a wheelchair and carried my walker on her shoulder because I would need it for one of the test. If there are awards she should get one.

CNP Stamper on both occasions has been extremely sharp, short and rude. She was told I didn't have insurance to cover the sleep test due to new employment and didn't care one bit and gave me a 90 day DOT card and could of extended it until I had insurance, The in lab sleep test for self pay is over $5000, and the in home cost is over $2000. I've had my cdl for 7 years and she is the first and only care provider to ever recommend a sleep test even my PCP Dr Haus has never shown concern or even mentioned it to me. I show no symptoms, or concerns of sleep apnea besides my BMI. I'm very disappointed in her professionalism and lack of respect to her patients. She has now put me in a position of either loosing my job or going into several thousands of dollars of debt for a test she has no medical data to show that I need.

I unfortunately had to visit the Avita ER one morning for full body cramping and muscle spasms. Like many others that left reviews, I also thought that the nurses and front desk staff went above and beyond to try and take care of me. They did their blood draw and tests and made me feel safe and heard... However, the doctor that I spoke with was not helpful at all. She firstly was rather stand-off-ish and seemed to be trying to keep her distance from me rather than trying to help. I discussed my issues with her and she left and came back and the things she said on her second visit strongly implied that she hadn't listened to a word I had said. She then goes on to tell me that all my tests came back completely normal and that she would refer me to a specialist in the same hospital to try for a better diagnosis. After THREE DAYS of going back and forth with the nurses and the specialist trying to get the referral ro go through I finally just gave up. I am still experiencing the same issues as before, I have missed time (and money) from work, and now I also have this ridiculous bill to pay all for them not to help in the slightest. I will never go back to Avita.
Check-in was running slow but another kind person came to help process my info. The technician in the lab was nice, friendly and efficient. Overall a good experience.
I was having chest pains. The nurses and all staff were very nice. They move quickly to get the results but are very nice and patient. I would highly recommend Avita Emergency Room.

Went to the ED for my son (who is 2years old) to be checked bc he was severely sick, couldn’t stay awake for more than 5 minutes wouldn’t eat and had a horrible cough. When we got there there was 2 people in the waiting room and as we sat there more people came in and we sat in the waiting room for 2hrs and other people that showed up after us were going in ahead of us and the wait kept getting longer so we got tired of waiting and went to a different ED and got in within 5 minutes and came to find out he tested positive for rsv.

Shout out to Dr. Foster for performing a succesful total left knee replacement.  He and the staff at Avita Hospital, Ontario, Ohio deserve more than 5 stars! Nurses:  Sydney, Erica, Amber, Veronica, Jalenna, Shawauna, Cherie and student Sam, Sarah, Jason, Lyndsee. Nurse Assistants:  Kenzie, Laken, and Kaelyn. Social Worker LPN Ortho Navigator:  Jamie. PT:  Ethan and the wonderful PT that did not have her badge (I forgot her name). OT:  Kristin and Angie(?). Nurse Practioners:  Chad and Sam. Consultant:  Dr. Ursuchi. Carla at check-in and the wonderful nurse who checked in with Dr. Foster. Anesthesiologist had me calm and asleep before even going into OR. All were all excellent, professional, warm, patient, fun, funny, helpful, knowledgeable, and positive! There is so much more to say about these professionals. Thank you! I'm going to miss you while I'm gone!

Quickest service ever at Avita Imaging. Literally walked in at 1:25 for a 1:30 appointment. In car and headed back to work by 1:45. Staff was beyond kind, from check-in to imaging nurse. Exceptional service!!!

I am so thankful that I addessed my hip pain when I did.  Dr Foster and his support team are the best!!  Before, during and after my left hip replacement I was given the best of care.  My recovery…Amazing!  Now, at age 74 I’ll return to doing the things I love to do!
❤️Susan Wagner

Everyone was so very kind. Hope was my first nurse and so reassuring. I was taken in , was quick and gentleman at the front desk was efficient and nice. I was in the ER and seen by Dr Harper, he was was kind, efficient, thoughtful and thorough. The tests and labs were done quickly and set my mind at ease. The girl that did the ultrasound on my neck and arm/armpit area was so nice and caring she was just wonderful.
she made my visit go very nice and smooth thank you so much as well as the nurses who have no issues drawing my blood.
The x-ray tech was nice and kind as well.
We are so fortunate to have this amazing hospital in mansfield!

I wanna thank the entire staff on the 3rd floor from the doctor's, nurses, assistants, housekeepers, food service workers for a wonderful job on David. Shout out to Kayla, Logan, Tyler and all others who helped. If anyone has a love one who needs medical care with kindness, and professionalism take them here.😊✌💙🦚 …

Was there for 3 for days on weekend 3rd floor.  Nurses Lori, Tyler, and Christina, Excellent care and very kind Nurses all the way thru day and night they were there for my COPD and concerns.  The Nurses aides need to be retrained in patient help.  There to interested in just answering the phones and then when you ask for something you get the I don't know answer or when they do come in you ask for ice or a soda. They just go back to the desk. Nurses usually got them for me.  Also went one whole day without heart monitor working cause one aide said he couldn't find any sticky.  A nurse came up from another floor seemn it and fixed it for me.  There not well trained in what there supposed to be there for.  Four days not bed sheets changed.

This was my one year knee replacement checkup and my first work with Samantha.  I had 3 previous, post surgery appts with Dr. Foster over cracking knee sounds and continued PAIN.  For the first time, I felt listened to and had a procedure done. For the first time in 10 months, I felt HOPEFUL thanks to Samantha.
Bone density scan and mammogram done..I felt well taken care of. The nurses were amazingly sweet and helpful. Very short wait and it was all done.

If I could give 0 stars I would. Dr midkiff is awfully rude with a bad attitude and doesn’t take you seriously. Considering I had a 10 month old seen and was worried, I could’ve been taken more seriously and without the attitude . Got treated for something she tested NEGATIVE for. Seems like he’s lazy and just wanted us out. But here I am third round at the ER to get some answers on my sick daughter.
Dr. Foster was so thorough with his examination of both knees. He explained how my issues need to be fixed. He didn’t try to do needless surgery.

Well I have been going there  for a very long time and I love the people there.  They are very pleasant to me. So yes I would recommend them any time.  They are very professional. Thank you all for your help.

I was a patient the past 4 days at the Ontario hospital, 3rd floor room 3760.  I can't say enough about just how great the nurses and doctors were. Right down to the cleaning staff, cafeteria and all the wonderful nurses and doctors. I want to say a BIG thank you to all.

Great experience and I will most definitely go again if I need to. Everyone was very welcoming, I didn't have a long wait.   And you can tell that everyone cared.    Loved the experience! Thank you to Chelsea and her team!

This time in the ER Was very different from the last few times.  The personel were very professional and things were done very quickly.  The Dr. And nursing staff were great please thank them all for me.

I came in sick after, 4 days at home taking over the counter medicine. Found out I had COVID virus, they gave me 5 days of 3 different kinds of medicine and I glad I came because the young CNP Madison Dackin did a complete check up on me including an X-ray to check if my lungs were clear.I would have her again anytime. 100%.

I took my daughter to go to thier emergency room and there was no one there. Keep in mind that she was bleeding, AND STILL IS AFTER OVER 30 MINUTES NOW. She hit her head on the sharper part of the window and even applying pressure on it for 30 MINUTES, ITS STILL BLEEDING. Thank you to the nurse who was MORE HELPFUL THAN THE DOCTOR HIMSELF. He was soo unprofessional telling me that I was overreacting after looking at my daughter FOR 2 SECONDS and saying that she's fine. Well, I went to another doctor, IN ANOTHER HOSPITAL to get seen and SHE NEEDED STITCHES. DONT EVER GO TO THIS MANSPLAING HOSPITAL FOR THE DOCTORS WHEN YOU CAN GET BETTER ADVISE FROM THE NURSES THERE, PERIOD.

Thank You all at Avita for being so Kind and helpful during my mamo, and Bone scan visit.... I will definitely make a point  having all my future testing done here at Avita.... Thanks to all the Avita Staff... Your all GREAT
My mother has Alzheimer's and they all treat her with respect. They give quality care. I am so glad our area has a choice on where we can take our loved ones when they are hurt.

I had a wonderful experience in three different departments. My visit started with registration, and the lady who got me registered was personable, efficient, and thoughtful. She got me registered for bloodwork, x-ray, and an EKG. The lady from the lab promptly got me from the waiting area. She was so personable as well! She also was very skilled in her modality. When she was finished she escorted me to imaging. I gave my labels to the lady at registration there and she immediately called over to cardiology to see if they wanted me right after the x-ray. Someone came and got me for the x-ray after a very short wait. Once that was finished she escorted me to cardiology where someone was ready for the EKG. The EKG was done before I knew it, and the kind lady who did that made sure to walk me all the way back to the exit to the lobby. Everyone was so nice and helpful, as well as so efficient with their time.

The medical staff at the ER demonstrated exceptional professionalism. During my overnight stay, I received outstanding care from the nurses, doctors, and technicians. Given my numerous health concerns, their attentive support was truly remarkable. In my opinion, Avita is the top hospital without a doubt.

E.r.is usually pretty good with exception of one or two e.r Drs that let their ego overun listening to patients. My husband has to come to do COPD problems. But tonight. We brought him in after the second day of being here. They just sat him in the hall and ignored him. He was wheezing and having a real hard time. They should have more then one e.r Dr and be able to treat someone til they can see a Dr.  Four hour waits for most people is not acceptable especially if there in breathing stays problems.
The nurse was amazing but I feel like the physician was didn’t want to do her job. I did not feel heard I’d rather stick with the wait time at Ohio health!
My family and I are at a softball tournament 2 hours from home. I came to the ER after being hit in the head by a softball.  Great service to an out of towner!! Thank you!

I reviewed charges for tests given and the out patient summary because the bill seemed extremely high compared to a similar visit at a different hospital. I noticed my child was not treated because of the result of any outcome
of any test  but was sent off with a prescription for antibiotics nonetheless. Negative for SARS/CoVID, Strep, Flu and you have no actual diagnosis listed but you write a script for antibiotics? I guess antibiotics resistance is no longer a thing for some doctors. I paid the rest of the bill. It was an expensive lesson but the only way I’d ever go back to this Avita is against my will.

When you are asked to come with a full bladder and have to go to the bathroom and you don't get called until 30 minutes later, after your appointment, then you have to wait for another 30+ minutes before you can go to the restroom,  you tell me how you would feel.

Staff is always kind and considerate at Avita.
But getting an automated text at 2:16 a.m. is wrong!!! I thought it was a family member and someone was having an emergency. They need to reset their computers. Who goes back to sleep after that? Not me.

Not a great experience at all. When my mammogram was scheduled I was not told where to go for mammogram. I get there go to imaging and no one is at the reception desk so I open door to imaging asking "hello". A blonde with glasses comes out a room and I give my name and why I am there. She states she has me and sit in waiting area. I pre-registered so I sat in waiting area. An hour latter I ask how long it will be. 2 students advise they will find out for me. Finally a rad tech comes out and questions me. I give her the story and by the time they take me back I have now waited 1 1/2 hours.
I think avita needs to have clear signage advising where to go and advise where reception is if imaging has no reception.

I am a visually impaired, chronic illness patient, I have seen many EDs. I was treated extremely well while I was in your ED.  Staff was kind and attentive, even though I’m a difficult stick, they were pros. They found a diagnosis that had gone unnoticed thus far and I was home in just a few hours, resting more comfortably than I had in days. Very grateful to the ED nurses and Drs. It even became very busy and we were never left feeling ignored or less important.
Sheila, Jamie, and Dr. Rhiehm are wonderful! Not only informative, but caring and really listen to my concerns. Amazing care for my son! Thank you!

After having to wait6-10 hours to get seen at Ohio health, it is so refreshing to have an appointment that and you are actually in being seen before your appointment time. I totally am so satisfied with Avita. That’s my hospital now.
My experience was wonderful. I felt very comfortable the entire staff was awesome.  I felt like I was the only patient there

Everyone was so very kind.  Hope was my first nurse and so reassuring.  I was taken in ,  was quick and front desk was efficient and nice. Dr Harper was kind, efficient, thoughtful and thorough.  The tests and labs were done quickly and set my mind at ease. The facility itself is like a private clinic- so beautiful.  I was placed is a room to meet my needs.  The cleaning staff lady was so sweet! We are so fortunate to have this amazing hospital in mansfield.

Had an appointment (Cardiology Department) but couldn't find the office. Asked several employees for directions, they gave vague directions and or weren't sure where it was. I finally located cardiology rehab and she walked me to the office. For me to be told I was late and had to reschedule. If the employee's had known where the office was, or took the time to look it up for me I would not have been late or had toreschedule.And I would not have been stressed out, light headed with my heart pounding so fast!! Please train your employee's to help patients not make them feel like they are unimportant!! Thank you.

I had an accident with small circular saw (Dremel) and cut my  hand between thumb and index finger. I delayed care thinking it would heal but after 24 hours I sought care at Avita Ontario. While this is normally too long to stitch they thought the injury too deep not to. All who participated in my care were terrific and I could not ask for better treatment. Thanks to all who participated in my care!
We were treated like family at Avita.  Everyone was professional and kind, especially Our nurse Whitney, and Jason.  I can't remember the other helpers, but they were all great.

Avita Ontario is a great facility. Employees were extremely nice and made sure I was comfortable. MRI was noisy as all MRIs are, but was fine even with my claustrophobia. I was in and out quickly. Highly recommend

They found a small cyst on my right breast in Oct  I returned for another evaluation yesterday. The X-ray technicians were kind and comforting to me as I was very nervous about the outcome of the mammogram and ultrasound.  I highly recommend them to anyone needed a similar procedure.

I just had a CT scan. On my chart it says I have a kidney stone. I went to er April 2023 I had a CT scan cause of side pain. On my chart it says I have a kidney stone then. Why was I told I didn't have a kidney stone?
They said they couldn't find anything wrong. Not happy with er. The CT scan people this time was good not last year.
From the moment I walked in they took me right away. Blood draw from my hand this time. Did not feel a thing. Was in and out the quickest I have ever experienced.

I came after landing in an unmarked hole on the Bike Trail around the Trimble Rd bridge during ParkRun. Needing to know what I was dealing with 4 weeks out from the Shawshank Hustle. Just need the follow up with the VA clinic on Monday. Thank you. Praying for a mild sprain.
Everyone was courteous and professional and explained each procedure so there was no doubt on what to expect.

Registration clerk was friendly, kind, and professional. Minimal wait time. Phlebotomist was really good at her job! I hardly felt a thing with the lab draw. She made sure that I was comfortable. Overall, a great experience with Avita Ontario, registration and lab.
Dr Tausch has been a very compassionate and thorough with my concerns. I highly recommend him as an urologist

Despite the amount of pain I was in, I felt very taken care of and heard. My nurse, I wish I could remember her name, had the most amazing bedside manner. The entire staff kept me very informed about what needed done and what my options were.
The  X ray lady was very nice and really great at her job. Doctor Riehm  was very professional  and very good at his job. Very happy with Doc Riehm.

Go for that amus were very amazingly sweet and funny also the other phlebotomist that came in to help find a vein was very quick and very technical she was awesome sweet and funny as well I enjoyed actually being in the lab and everybody made it a very nice and smooth process.

5 stars to Dr. Foster and his Team! Start to finish my hip replacement experience was well-coordinated and patient-centered. Special thanks to Dr. Foster, who handled unexpected complexity so well; Liz, a great listener and guide; Jane, Joint Camp Queen and expert nurse; Kaelyn, night stna who planned ahead and anticipated my needs with empathy and patience; Jason and Brenna the PT and OT gurus who were flexible with help for my home access things;  Dr. Bihl who was thorough; and Carrie, who managed my discharge work. I’m grateful for the whole team at Avita!

I was at Avita ER ... They took very good care of me real quick... I didn't have to wait for a long time. The Doctor she was awesome on it.She was so nice to me and very patient and very understanding me. Not rushing out the door. The Ex-ray Dept. They also was excellent and quick. My (2) Nurses who was sign to my room they are the ( Best) If I had to give them a high score it will be a # 10 along... With the... ER Doctor. Thank you Avita ER Staff.

The MRI technician was great to work with.   He got me in, explained everything and got my MRI done very quick.  I said it before and I  will continue to say it... Avita is the place to go for medical care.  I have never had a bad experience there.
I will continue to go to Avita for all my health care needs!
The staff that give me the MIR was very professional and kind they went above and beyond to make me comfortable and I really appreciate those too ladies that help me at Avita

Dr Werth spent time going over things with me. She ordered test and things to to to figure out my problem. She called me personally the next day with blood work results and we are currently trying to a medication to solve the problem

I got put in a room with an old broken down OB table no cover no blanket no pillow room was freezing! Took forever to get my results because couldn't figure out how to get the files transferred over! Left with no answers called my doctor the next day they told me something that was on there that I was not told at the hospital just a very frustrating experience all the way around!
The tech for so friendly and kind! She understood my concerns and problem to lat flat and said to take a break anytime I needed! So compassionate!

Dr marker read the reports from where I’ve been to Bucyrus Hospital week before on Sunday and saw immediately that I had a 5 x 7 x 8 mm stone and nobody told me that from Bucyrus I was able to get into urologist and I’m set up for a procedure on Tuesday I’m thankful for that with the holiday weekend but thankful to get some relief soon

Avita hospital nurses and Drs. We're very nice and knowledgeable and bedside manners were excellent. They helped me in the best way they could and greatly appreciated it.would highly recommend Avita hospital for services.
All the nurses were so amazing when I came to the ER ... all the staff was awesome BUT the nurses did their Job AMAZINGLY!!!
I had a great time at the ER. Everyone was was happy and very caring.  I won't hesitate to come back for any problems I may have in the future.

Cindy was in ER...Always great care. 👍💕💕💕💕💕
Everyone from ER registration  staff . EKG tech Radiology. And the Nurses were fabulous.
Dr Midkiff was great. …
Kelly and Val were great!  They were super busy but got my MRI done quickly. Very professional and efficient!

CAT SCAN!
Came prepared for a long wait.
Was through checking in 15 minutes ahead of schedule.
Sat down ready to settle in.
17 minutes later I was in the parking lot.
Didn’t even get to finish my coffee.
Avita Ontario Radiology/imaging department is awesome. They have a great facility and the medical technicians are excellent.
Avita hospital is always my choice when going in to the ER. The people there are so incredibly kind and pleasant. It is always a great experience being taken care of there.

I’ve been out of work do to an underlying condition do to a Intussusception! An this has been going on for over 6 months with no resolve! The doctor says it’s clear I got something going on! I’ve been in an out of the hospital 20+ times an now they are refusing to give me a doctors excuse! Very sad an very unprofessional
Charlis Davis is the best family Doctor that I have ever had he listen to you very helpful when you talk to him like one your best friend 100% great place

Chad Miley was awesome. This was my first cortisone shot and he explained everything to me and even went in depth with other ways to help heal and improve. I also don’t do well with needles and he was so amazing with that. Just a wonderful experience all around.

Literally had the best experience. I felt so welcomed and cared for. Thank you Jayden k for being so sweet, and to the young gentlemen in the front, plus doctor Midkiff. truly the best. Will be going back for sure.

All my experiences with Avita have been excellent.  I love  Dr
Bhiel. He is a great Dr.

My physician is lauren kaufman, I couldn't ask for a nicer practitioner. She is through, answers all my guestions and makes shure I fully understand everything before I leave her office. I thank her for all she does.
Dr. Emlich was awesome. He heard me. He read my previous testing, surgery report ER reports. We had a conversation. He knew me.
Very Inviting And Welcoming, The Staff Are Very Professional And Nice , Never Have To Wait Too Long
The best emergency room services I have ever received! I drove a county away to go here and will continue too for the future
I had to get a MRI they made my visit stress less I was in and out fast the equipment was very new that’s a good thing this will be my hospital going forward thank you for your care

Went to the emergency room tonight for stiff neck, muscle spasms, and minor surging pain in my head. Once I got in I sat there for almost 3 hours to see a doctor for less than 3 minutes. She didn't seem to care about the problems I was having, and come across as condescending. They gave me an ibuprofen and sent me home. Did not give me any reassurance about the problems I've been having for the last 3-4 weeks. With everything else in mind the other nurses, practitioners, and RN were very kind and sweet to me, but seeing the initial doctor for such a short period of time and for her to barely look at me was very frustrating. Could have been because I don't have insurance, or because she thought my problem was insignificant. I expressed I was having tooth pain that had since been helped with antibiotics and felt like it could have been associated with that. I believe it could be a strain or pull, but the feeling is different than a strain I've had before. Her barely looking at me and kind of shrugging me off did not give me piece of mind and left a sour taste in my mouth. I could've been more persistent, but I didn't want to get seen by someone who didn't seem to care/didn't have the time to waste on something that may seem minor to her.

got to the lab early. 4 names ahead of me but i dont think i waited 20 minutes from signing in to having my blood drawn.
lab tech was PERFECT.  Lots of times my veins blow - barely felt the needle and she hit gold right off the bat!!!  No bruises at all afterwards
Dr Riehm and his staff are awesome! I received great care and thorough instruction!! I highly recommend Ontario Avita and Dr. Riehm!!!
Had a great experience at Avita Ontario! Everyone is so welcoming and friendly and take such great care of you!

I was at avita Ontario ER today with my daughter. Over the past month she has been disregarded and untreated by two other local emergency departments. She has been very sick. The staff at this location was wonderful. Not only did they get her in right away and stayed on top of monitoring her, they were very compassionate and attentive to her needs. They ran tests  immediately and helped her feel better. I was very pleased with the staff, the cleanliness of the facility and their willingness to listen to our concerns and help.

Dr. Riehm is very kind and understanding.  He took the time to listen to my concerns and I never felt rushed. I am very pleased with the care that I received from Dr. Riehm. The office staff are very friendly as well.

I can't say it enough how grateful I am to the men and women and Avita, specifically the ICU staff. My son who is special needs came in with afib. He was terrified of hospitals do to trauma caused my OhioHealth Mansfield. We were grateful he was able to come here instead. Everyone was great and treated him kindly with dignity and respect.
There was no wait. Was able to get in when they opened. They took good care of me.
As always, the lab technicians at Avita were outstanding. Even those in training are very polite, caring and talented!

Excellent care received by Dr.Stainbrook, his staff and all the wonderful lab technicians! I began coming here in August 2023 and every visit has been met with caring, kindness, efficiency and exceptional care. It’s a little gem and I’m grateful they’re nearby! Thank you all!

I went in for dizziness and giddiness, I was in there waiting for about 5 minutes. Not even. My nurses were so gentle and nice! They were amazing and my doctor was super nice and honest. They did the best they could with what they had and did everything to code! Everyone that treated me deserves a raise! Everyone that treated me did everything in their power to treat me and figure what was wrong with me. They actually listened and understood what I was saying and did everything they could with what info I gave them. I couldn't thank them enough for how nice and thoughtful and kind they were! I didn’t get any photos with my nurses or doctors this time. But I definitely will next time to show you guys who and how amazing they are
Barb who checked me in was very helpful and pleasant.  The philobomist was also very nice.

Excellent patient care during my visit to the ER. All of my questions were answered from beginning to end.
The ladies in the CT Scan Department were excellent in getting me positioned properly so that we had exceptional results to read.
Thank You Avita

Chad Miley was an excellent provider his time and care he gave to explain everything put me at ease.  I was able to get an injection in my knee, which helped with the pain I had been experiencing.  I was in and out of there with Xrays in less than an hour.
I have a bad back. Those girls made sure I was comfortable and I Really appreciate their care for me.

Charlotte checked me in for blood work and she's the happiest person on earth ! The lab technician, as always, was swift and painless in her blood draw. Avita is everything you could want in a health providing center. 💞 …

I was greeted by a friendly and kind clerk who made my check-in quick and efficient. The technician was professional, respectful, sensitive, gentle, and kind; she was quick to answer any questions and concerns. I would highly recommend Avita radiology from my experience.

Dr Bess, I appreciated his professionalism and time with me. The nurses Tarah and Dom were the bomb! And I had two Hannah’s that were also  exceptional. Being a healthcare provider myself, I recognize we are not always the easiest patients be cause it’s not what we do! We care for others and can be uncomfortable being the one receiving care. But the group I had caring for me were exceptional and I truly appreciate each and everyone from the ER staff, to registration, lab, CT imaging. You ALL did a great job! THANK YOU!!

Over the past 4 weeks Courtney my OT has been manipulating my left shoulder which was very stiff and sore. With stretching and exercises she recommended I am almost to full range of motion with very little pain. She is very courageous and knows her job well.

From the minute I stepped into Ontario Avita Health I was suprised by the assistance that was offered to me.  I was there for testing and I 1st was approached by a worker pushing a wheelchair asking if I needed assistance.   Then as I stood waiting very briefly to register, I was asked if I needed help again by another worker.  When I was filling out paperwork, the 2 workers who were assisting me were very upbeat and pleasant.  As soon as I just sat down I was called in for my tests. Jennie, who did the testing, showed deep respect and kindness in doing the tests and she was very much interested in me as a person and my concerns and very caring and upbeat.  I moved here from RI recently and never did I recieve the treatment at this health care facility  back in RI.  It makes me happy to know I can feel comfortable from the minute I walk in till I leave.  Jennie thanks for your concern.  Respect and care.  Best personality ever!

A visit to Dr Haus is a great experience. He is caring, positive, reassuring and always educates in a kind, relational way. He is a trustworthy and excellent physician, and I am happy to recommend him.
I enjoy this mammography group, however I dislike the waiting area, cold, several others doctors office & germy

The Radiology Technician was very friendly and helpful.  She displayed professional behavior as well as being very pleasant.  I enjoyed having her take care of me.  The entire procedure took only about 10 minutes.  I would definitely recommend having her perform other radiological procedures

Julia was my lab technician. I ended up being 8 weeks early for my draw (forgot I did one in Jan) and even though she couldn't draw my blood, she was very apologetic and wanted to do whatever she could for me. The fault was mine, but she tried to own it for my sake (even with a smile).

Jim

Neveen and physician assistant were great!  I really appreciated their kindness and attentiveness.  I very much appreciated that the paperwork was not completed until after my emergency need had been resolved. The priority was focused on the patient and not the bill.  Thank you Avita.   We are blessed to have you in Mansfield.

This is the 1st time after 5 E.R., Urgent Care or doctor office visits that someone took the tim to run tests and come up with a diagnosis.
Thank you to Ashley Sudol and Dr. Carsey.

There was practically no waiting to make an appointment; check in was easy the whole procedure from check I. To scan and done was maybe 15 minutes. The results were posted on “My Chart” just a little over 24 hours.  Fantastic and easy
The staff here is amazing. They have a great bedside manner and are very professional.

I had an appointment for a shot in my knee and asked about hip and
back pain from a back problem I've been having. I wanted to make sure it was only my back causing a problem and not my hip so they took the time right then and there to take an exray of my hip to assure me that nothing was wrong with my hip. That assurance just made me feel so much better and now feel confident about my back surgery. Thank you so much for taking the time to put my mind at ease. I love Avita people from checking in to checking out. All the staff is wonderful and very thoughtful. I feel like I'm part of the family!!
I prefer this hospitals ER to any other in this area. It is small however the ER gets you in and out in good time.
I have had excellent service so far with Avita hospital and the Dr s and Nurse practitioners including in the offices

Registration is always nice. the nursing staff are accommodating and friendly, eager to help. But that's as far as it goes. I took my adult son there and Dr midkiff was a complete jerk. He came into the room with a chip on his shoulder and was absolutely zero help with my son's specific issue. Was sent to another a walk in clinic, after waiting 3 HOURS to be seen.
Then last night my bf went in because he was passing a kidney stone. They started an IV for absolutely nothing.... after a cat scan was told the kidney stone probably passed and was sent home. Again zero help. Avita DO BETTER!!!

Our wait was 5 minutes. From the minute we walked in we were met with nice, compassionate people. Dr Bess, Stephanie & Kara were caring, listened intently to what was going on with my husband and explained what they could do to help.  We were treated by caring people who made us feel like we mattered.  Thank you!

Went in at 3:30am because I can't hear out of my ear and 3rd shift Dr said it's build up ear wax and sent me home without even doing anything.  In years past they always have and tonight was slow. Wow let's say I'll never be back to this location. Take them out of the mall!
Very efficient and professional. No long wait or multiple attempts extremely pleased.
Judith Arehart is the BEST person to draw your blood!! I have chronic kidney disease and have NO veins. Judy can get it EVERY time, 1ST try, no digging!! I request her and only let her do my labs ❤️

The Avita ER staff was amazing during my visit last night. Everyone was very friendly, showed concern for my injury, explained everything in detail about my healing process and steps to take along the road to recovery. I am so fortunate to live so close to such a great facility! Thank you so much for everything!

Went to lab for Dr Paul next week. Always caring and kind. Wait was not excessive for time of day, was very busy. Then later went to Dr Amurao’s office for 6 month follow-up. He is so kind and gentle. So appreciate him.
When she put the needle in my arm.I accidentally kicked her! I was so embarrassed I have never done that before. She was really great about it.And we laughed it off. She was very kind.
Two hours to read a ultrasound was the only thing that upset me. The staff is amazing!
Pretty nice place the staff in the cafeteria are great! Cheap food great quality and a very clean atmosphere I highly recommend!
The ER staff is amazing! They really were so kind and understanding. When you’re used to the horrible staff at MedCentral these folks are a breath of fresh air.

I had a follow up appointment at Avita Paincare with Anna Gantz CNP APRN and Tiffany.  We reviewed medication progress and MRI results. We discussed further plans of care. Notice the WE? IT  is a WE  plan. Anna and Tiffany make sure I'm included in every step of my care and planning.
It was evident that Anna Gantz is invested in my outcome whether it's trying new techniques or medication or finding ways to decrease the pain. She and Tiffany have a don't give up attitude. I appreciate a fresh pair of eyes.

Thanks team.

I love your hospital and I hope to get a lifelong care I deserve and I love every person in this hospital and think of all of you being my family since I am the last remaining Charles will and Jacquelyn Joann. Beck family their second son. Bye and thank you go being my friend brothers sisters children and grandchildren, ha ha lol but if you think of my age you will understand my thoughts, bye
I love the hospital everyone so nice Dr Foster was so good.

I went to the ER after a fall. They were really busy that night, but I was taken to a room after waiting 35 to 40 minutes. I was treated with dignity and exrays were taken, and followup treatment given. Total time in ER was four hours. Great facility, great doctors, great care!

I have had nothing but great care every time we have had a visit to Avita Ontario Emergency Department. I was there recently with kidney stones, and the providers were patient, kind, and knowledgeable. They explained everything to my mother and I thoroughly. I am grateful for the care I received.

I think her name started with a J but I know she 47 years old.  Because I am 46  and was talking to her about how nervous I was because this was my first mammogram. She's been getting them since she was thirty and made it a very good …
Our nurse, Nathaniel, was amazing! He really put us at ease with his sense of humor and was great at keeping my scared daughter calm while getting an IV. Excellent bedside manner!
Avita is a perfect place to go when you have a medical need. Every one - without exception- has been professional yet friendly. The doctors and staff are knowledgeable and explain things well.
I had a wonderful experience. Dr. Davis was attentive, informative, and knowledgeable. I appreciated his thoroughness; I felt heard and cared for.

Nurses and registration are the only people who listen or give you the time of day. I went in New years eve and was there for 4.5 hours for what feels like a compressed nerve, saw Dr. Bailey and they ran blood labs and a ct scan, told me they didn't know what was wrong, but couldn't tell if it was a pinched nerve or not. They prescribed Prednisone, which isn't used to treat the problem I'm having, without taking into consideration other medical issues I have and giving me no information on said steroid. I had to look up the side effects and all information on it myself. Then I had to return the next day for an allergic reaction, sharp abdominal pain and bleeding issues from taking the Prednisone. They gave me a shot of benadryl and didn't do any further testing to check for internal damage, despite the fact that I specifically requested it. Dr. Dahiya talked AT me for two seconds, rather than TO me, before speeding out of the room and leaving everything to the nurse and telling me, "good luck, my friend." I will not return to Avita. Just an extremely dismissive staff.
Hands down the best hospital experience I have ever had. The staff were extremely attentive, knowledgeable and compassionate.

Extremely kind and caring, and I was AMAZED! at how fast they took care of me. Extremely respectful.  I will be making this
Hospital my regular.. Nice friendly atmosphere and vibe.  Coworkers are friends with each other and you can tell they value teamwork makes you fly right through one side and set up ready to go out the other.... 😁👍😎
What a great place for med service.  These folks were really on it.   Very communicative.  Absolutely Top Notch
I was in a lot of pain when I arrived yesterday I felt like they took care of me and helped relieve most of my pain I was satisfied with everyone I came in contact with

I was told the appointment was at 5pm yet when I arrived early they told me it was scheduled for 6pm. What I am most pleased with is that I was the only patient in the lobby, and the took me back at a little after 5pm. They did not make me wait until 6pm. The care was excellent.
Sarah was so nice and sweet and professional!  Loved her!

I have to go every week to get my blood checked and I take my great-granddaughter with me and the people that man the door are so kind to her and she just loves them and the ladies in the lab are wonderful I couldn't ask for better care when I'm there
The doctor and technician was extremely professional and caring. Thank you

Homer and I swear by AVITA! They have the best doctors, nurses and staff of anywhere we have ever been! Our recent visit was with Dr Sharma in PAIN MANAGEMENT! Dr Sharma   is professional and seriously cares about his patients/clients!.Homer would never ever go to any other PAIN MANAGEMENT DOCTOR! Dr Sharma has done everything in his power to help Homer and has never given up on him! Homers pain is excruciating at times & Dr Sharma realizes his needs!We appreciate Dr Sharma more than I could ever put into words! Also, he has amazing, caring staff and that’s means a lot to both of us! AVITA we hope you realize who you have working for you and and give them the recognition they deserve!
Dr Bihl, Dr Randall, Dr Foster, Dr Sharma to name a few that we have been honored to have as our Doctor’s! If they ever leave AVITA , WE WILL FOLLOW THEM! 100% the BEST!

Evaluation of blood work done was within minutes. Did not require an additional visit. You might have to demand it, but they will, can and did fill a prescription based on blood work without an additional appt

We are blessed to have AVITA medical facilities and staff in our communities.
Thanks to all your medical staff, administrators, and management for the high quality “total” commitment to our Ohio communities. ✔️🙌👏 …

I usually don't give bad reviews but my husband and I went in because our heart Dr sent us over to get a blood clot looked at. Instead they did xrays and lied to us. The Dr said the blood work showed Gout, NO ONE CAME IN TO TAKE THE BLOOD. So we wanted to know how the blood work showed it. I called the next day and told them about the experience. They apologized. Then we got the bill. I should not have to pay for lies. Plus such a long wait. Now I have no idea where to go or what hospital to trust. It's really sad.

Upon entering the main hospital entrance I was greeted by an unhappy little bald man at the front desk. When I asked where my child was at that was just brought into the ED this little man said he had no record of this person in the hospital. I asked if there was someone else I could talk to that could help and he rolled his eyes and rudely replied, “who do you want to talk to?” I told him I wanted someone who would actually help me find my child and walked away.

As someone who works with hospitals every single day in a professional capacity I am absolutely appalled that someone at the front desk of a hospital would behave this way to someone who is worried about the well-being of their child. I only wonder if this attitude is endemic to this facility. I will not return to this facility unless faced with a life threatening situation.

The initial approach to the building was great the lady working this morning was absolutely amazing she got me right back into the ER but that was the best part of the trip. They did not even look at the stuff I told him was wrong and I know I have broken ribs from another specialist directly after leaving this facility and the doctor there was a male older gentleman did not even touch me I had a release report from them talking about contusions and how you can't see broken ribs through a layer of dried blood needless to say I went all the way through the visit just so I could write this review this was absolutely the most horrible experience I've ever had at any doctors emergency rooms or care physicians. I do not recommend not even one star and I do not recommend taking your dogs to this facility let alone your children or yourself.

Overall care has been excellent both in labs and hospital. Biggest problem is intake for labs. Layout not great but staff really tries to get you checked in and serviced. A bit more time needed to iron the wrinkles. Food service is very good especially for a hospital. Most dishes are prepped fresh when ordered. As a patient and as a companion to a patient I'd rate the food as very good.

Easily one of the worst maternity departments I've ever seen. I've been with many laboring moms in many different hospitals and this floor does not care for patients, they care about numbers. I'd give zero stars if I could. Please consider delivering elsewhere.
Friendly, knowledgeable staff made our ER visit quick and seamless
Everyone that was involved in my care were kind and caring from the time I walked through the door until the time  I walked out of the ER department

I was just overnight for a medical procedure Jan 4, '23, and received wonderful care and attention at this hospital. Everyone I encountered was fantastic and I appreciate the top notch care.
Thank you all !
It’s the best care I ever received!! Great Doctor great staff!!
Kelly made my appointment incredible!! Its a terrible test but she almost made it fun!!  Kelly is the BEST! Thank you for your wonderful care Kelly.

Would honestly never return in my life. A man recently called me and stated I had been to Avita 11 times in the last 2 years and owed all this money impossible but ok. Next out of the 3 times I have went the man in the ER doing MRI's blew my views 2 separate times essentially making me do 3 separate MRI's. Which they charged me for, the nurse told me I had diverticulitis and prescribed vicodine to which the pharmacy never got. I then developed a rash and severe pain which they indicated I should return if any changes. I went back 1 week later to discover I actually had shingles they then wouldn't give me anything for pain because I was already "prescribed" vicodine supposedly. Now my wages are being garnished for 8900 dollars because I had shingles. Worst hospital I have ever came acrossed. That's not my only awful experience with Avita. I'd recommend ohio health any day.

I went to this place on
2-20-23 @ around 4:30pm. The experience was not good.  I went in for a burn and one of the help on duty put a band-aid on one of my bubbled burn🤦‍♀️🤨 and the nurse practitioner on duty said she called in a prescription for me and when I got to my pharmacy, she had not done so. So I had to call the emergency room and the nurse practitioner says she will call it in when she gets a minute 😳. Really!!
I dont recommend this place.

I had a 10 am consultation with Dr. Ghozoul today. I showed up at 9:45, with new patient paperwork in hand all filled out, and sat in the waiting area until almost 10:30 before I was taken back to a room and checked-in. It was 11:00 and nobody had been in the room. I decided at that point I was leaving as I have to use my sick time from work for this visit and it was clearly getting wasted. I told the lady in check out that I was leaving and all she said was "ok". I stopped at reception and explained why I was leaving and asked for my co-pay to be refunded. The receptionist went and talked to the check-out lady and came back to refund my copay, and all she said was "thank you"!!!! Not one apology from any staff or the Dr. herself as at this point she was standing at the check-out. I understand that she has a busy and demanding job, but come on, at least let your patients know what's going on & that you're running behind to see if they need to reschedule.

I had a friend here for 5 day's they was never admitted to the hospital they kept them in the er for 5 days. They kept saying that they was waiting for a bed for them at Riverside so why didn't they put them in a room here until they got them one at Riverside?? I wish that I hadn't deleted the pictures I took of the surgine that they left one the counter or the vile that was also left there that had pain meds in it so agents the law I thought the room had not been cleaned in the 5 days that they was there. I have never seen a hospital this bad before. And believe me ours ain't the best but compared to this one I would give ours a five. This one gets a 1. And when you can't give someone an ensure you say that you don't have it and you asked us to bring them some from home that is really bad.

Brittany Attwood CNP
Avita Health System is Awesome!
She is super easy to talk to and will let you ask any question you have. She takes the time to explain things,and she always makes sure you understand what she's shared. Her Staff are extremely friendly and helpful. They are very welcoming and are willing to answer any questions you may have with a smile.
Highly recommend this Office.
I've only ever been here to 2 times and I won't go back once for my sister once for my son . Rude rude rude . 0/10. You'd get better service at a trash can . Ridiculous .

The people are always nice but they didnt treat the infection with antibiotics, went to urgent care and they said I needed a zpack right away for the respitory infection. They also didn't tell me about a curve in my spine, I had to find out from my test results myself. I guess if I continue to go here I need to stay until I can see my own test results. Kinda disappointed, my family loves this place but I really feel kept out of the loop, never even met my doctor.
Charlotte from the Avita Lab area is so nice and brightens up the whole place!
